name: Fedora 41 Workstation
install_guide_markdown:
# Fedora 41 Workstation Installation Guide

Fedora uses DNF package manager and cutting-edge technologies. Follow the graphical installer for a standard desktop setup.

install_steps.title: Download Fedora 41 ISO
install_steps.detail_md: Download the Fedora 41 Workstation ISO from official Fedora mirrors.

install_steps.title: Verify ISO Checksum
install_steps.detail_md: Verify SHA256 checksum to ensure ISO integrity.

install_steps.title: Create Bootable USB
install_steps.detail_md: Use Fedora Media Writer, Etcher, or dd to create bootable media.

install_steps.title: Install Fedora
install_steps.detail_md: Boot from USB and follow the graphical installer prompts.

install_steps.title: Post-Install Setup
install_steps.detail_md: Update system and install additional packages using DNF.

privacy_notes: Fedora collects minimal system information; telemetry can be disabled.
notes: Fedora focuses on latest technologies and forward compatibility. Updates every 6 months.
